_comment: Jenkins (Java 21, Stable) Egg — Maintained by Robert Augesen
name: Jenkins (Java 21, Stable)
author: robert@augesrob.net
description: Fully working Jenkins egg for Pterodactyl — runs Jenkins LTS on Java 21, auto-creates /home/container/tmp and jenkins_home, fixes permission errors, and fully validates on import.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# ----------------------------------------------------------
# Jenkins installation script for Pterodactyl
# Author: Robert Augesen (augesrob)
# ----------------------------------------------------------
set -e

apt update -y && apt install -y wget ca-certificates openjdk-21-jre-headless

cd /mnt/server
mkdir -p jenkins_home tmp
chmod 777 jenkins_home tmp

LATEST_URL="https://get.jenkins.io/war-stable/latest/jenkins.war"
echo "Downloading Jenkins LTS from $LATEST_URL ..."
if ! wget -q --show-progress -O jenkins.war "$LATEST_URL"; then
    echo "⚠️  Failed to fetch latest LTS, falling back to Jenkins 2.479.3"
    wget -q --show-progress -O jenkins.war https://get.jenkins.io/war-stable/2.479.3/jenkins.war
fi

chown -R container:container /mnt/server
chmod -R 755 /mnt/server

clear
echo "✅ Jenkins installation complete!"
echo "➡️  WAR file: /mnt/server/jenkins.war"
echo "➡️  Home dir: /mnt/server/jenkins_home"
echo "➡️  Port: ${JENKINS_PORT:-8123}"
echo "➡️  Startup auto-creates /home/container/tmp and /home/container/jenkins_home"
exit 0

variables.name: Jenkins Port
variables.description: The port Jenkins will listen on (default 8123).
